title: Sell Shibui Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Shibui Whisky | Aged Single Grain & Malt | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Shibui whisky. We buy the aged statements including 15, 18, 23, and 30 Year Old single grain and malts.
introParagraph: Shibui bottles authentic aged whisky from varying Japanese distilleries. We purchase their high-age statement releases.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Shibui NAS blends (unless part of a set)
photoChecklist: Back label showing cask info/distillery source
conditionFactors: Box: Shibui packaging is often elaborate wood/leather. Must be intact.
Seal: Heavy stoppers, check for leaks.
pricingFactors: Age Statement: The 23 and 30 year old are the primary value drivers.
Cask Type: Sherry cask releases generally command a premium.
Distillery Source: Some Shibui releases disclose the source (e.g. Okinawa), which adds context.
Market: A newer brand, prices are more volatile than Yamazaki.

faqs.question: Is Shibui real Japanese whisky?
faqs.answer: Yes, they source from various distilleries (Okinawa etc) and bottle with age statements.

faqs.question: Do you buy the white oak releases?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy the full aged range.

faqs.question: How much is the 30 Year worth?
faqs.answer: It retails high, so secondary value is solid but expect a discount from retail.

faqs.question: Do I need the heavy box?
faqs.answer: Yes. Shipping without the custom box risks breaking the heavy bottle.

faqs.question: Do you buy Kurayoshi?
faqs.answer: Selectively. The Matsui/Kurayoshi aged statements are of interest.

faqs.question: Do you buy Kaiyo?
faqs.answer: Generally only the Cask Strength or aged versions.
